file_content.text: The war against the Killiks will continue--but you've done us a great service.
I spoke to Captain Ascercia. His plan to bomb the Killiks and slay their queen worked.
I heard the explosions... I hope those monsters burned alive.
We'll remember this service when House Thul takes the throne.
The battle against the Killiks is draining us all. Some of us forget the true enemy.
